title: $500.00 OFF Move-In Special!! 2 Bedroom Apartment
map_address: 3909 N Nellis Blvd near Leasing Office
posting_body: Where we like to set a standard of comfortable and luxurious living!
We are currently UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT!
Come check out our amazing renovated units.
These newly updated homes have been fitted with brand new flooring, fresh paint, and a whole new energy!
Each apartment comes with Fridge, Dishwasher, Stove, and full sized microwave and we can supply you with a washer and dryer, or you can bring your own!
You can relax and enjoy your early mornings, or late nights by sitting back on your private patio which is always nice to do.
Did we mention Water, Trash, and Sewage is included in your rent?
Terravita Apartments, offers covered parking, a sparking blue pool, On-Site Leasing office and 24 hour maintenance!
Close to shopping centers, Mom and Pop restaurants, tons of parks
